Text: Hey, this is my first torrent. Can anyone give me some tips on how to get as much exposure with this as possible?
You can post it at any public trackers you can find, such as mininova, meganova etc.

Thank you for seeding guys! At this rate I might actually be able to see that CTU version of Prison Break sometime soon. ;)

I forgot to mention. This is "only" the 50mb WMV version (which is why I named it as such), but there's a high quality h.264 version of this coming too. No more squiggly, floaty colors going all over the place!
A freakin kite made of tin foil...
A kite does not move as uniformed as this thing does. Also, look at it in full screen at the 3:10-3:32 mark. Does that not look like a typical sauser shaped UFO?
